name: Letizia Jaccheri
content: Letizia Jaccheri - NTNU Letizia Jaccheri Download press photo Download press photo Download press photo Foto: Close Letizia Jaccheri Professor Department of Computer Science Faculty of Information Technology and Electrical Engineering letizia.jaccheri@ntnu.no +4773593469 +4791897028 IT-bygget Gløshaugen, Trondheim office 216 Twitter Google Scholar Blog - Home Page www.letiziajaccheri.org About CV Letizia Jaccheri, Dame (Cavaliera, Order of Merit of the Italian Republic) has a Ph.D. from Politecnico di Torino, Italy. She is Professor of Software Engineering at the Department of Computer Science. Jaccheri's research is on software engineering for society with focus on inclusion. I am ACM distinguished speaker since 2018. To ask for a lecture fill the form at  ACM DSP Conferences I am currently involved in IEEE/ACM International Conference on Software Engineering https://conf.researchr.org/home/icse-2024 ACM womENcourage https://womencourage.acm.org/ Projects: Trondheim ACMs Women in Computing Chapter (2020 -) Erasmus + Women Stem Up  (2022 - 2025) Erasmus + TECHlarp (2025 - 2027) COST Action EUGAIN CA19122 (2022- 2024) Horizon e-ladda  (2020 - 2024) Horizon Craft (2022 - 2025) HK-DIR SENOBR (2021 - 2024) NFR IDUN (2019 - 2022) NFR IPIT (2018 - 2022) More Research - Software for a better society https://sbs.idi.ntnu.no/ Blog, books, podcast, thoughts https://letiziajaccheri.org/ For Industry / Public sector To propose student projects see here https://sbs.idi.ntnu.no/tdt4290 See wikipedia (norwegian) Competencies Computer games Gender equality Interaction design Software engineering Research Jaccheri's research is on software engineering for society with focus on inclusion.  Jaccheri leads the group Software for a better society Action Chair EUGAIN CA19122 - https://eugain.eu/ Project Leader IDUN https://www.ntnu.edu/idun Founder of Trondheim ACM's Women in Computing Chapter https://trondheimwomen.acm.org/home/ e-ladda https://www.ntnu.edu/e-ladda Craft https://www.ntnu.edu/smartcities/craft SENOBR https://www.ntnu.edu/idi/senobr Women Stem Up https://women-stem-up.eu Software Engineering Publications 2022 Martinez-Millana, Antonio; Michalsen, Henriette; Berg, Valter; Anke, Audny Gabriele Wagner; Martinez, Santiago; Muzny, Miroslav.
